This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailswhile traveling west on us 90 on 9\6\07 at 11:12 am mountain time my wife was taking pictures of the beautiful landscape. i was driving about 75 miles per hour and she shot the pictures through our ranger truck front and side windows. when we got home yesterday and loaded the pictures from my canon s60 digital camera set on auto to my computor and viewed them i saw objects i can identify. picture #6 has at least 4 objects ( upper sky center) picture #7 has one (upper sky left) at the time neither of us saw them. we have many, many pictures of landscapes taken with this camera and never have seen anything like this. feel free to use them in what ever manner you wish. jerry schilling
Summary: Taking landscape pictures and objects are in sky part of pictures
